name: So you want to be human?
name_original: So you want to be human?
description:
Arrow keys to move

You're a robot and your objective is to collect soul orbs in order to become human :)

This is my first game ever. I jumped into this game jam with no experience. I spent a lot of the jams time watching tutorials and running into bugs. Initially I was not going to submit, however my gf urged me to. The game is buggy. It has no enemies (though I spent time doing all the art code for them, I think something was wrong with my collisions and masks). The game also has no sound. I will continue to work on this game after the jam so it's more enjoyable.
